content.rendered:
Directed by Amit Kumar.

Written by Amit Kumar.

Cast Vijay Varma(Adi). Nawazuddin Siddiqui(Shiva). Neeraj Kabi(Khan). Geetanjali Thapa(Anu). Farhan Mohammad Hanif Shaikh(Chhotu). Tannishtha Chatterjee(Rani). Sreejita De(Geeta). R. Balasubramaniam(Dagar Bhai). Iravati Harshe(Nishi (as Irawati Harshe Mayadev)). Onkar Das Manikpuri(Taxiwallah (as Omkar Das Manikpuri)). Jayant Gadekar(Patil). Prithvi Zutshi(Minister). Surya Mohan Kulshreshtha(Tiwari). Niranjan N. Asrani(Comissioner Paul). Rohit Nitin Arekar(Pinto). Pravina Bhagwat Deshpande(Adi’s Mother (as Pravina Deshpande)). Shruti Bapna(Jemina Joseph). Chandrakant Taneja(Magistrate Naik). Honey Chhaya(Manager (Paradise Lodge)). Akhilesh Tiwari(Panwallah). Bhagwan Das(Blind Beggar). Mukesh Kumar(One arm beggar). Raj Rao(Ox cart driver). A.R. Rama(Rider). Mohit Chauhan(Builder Ali). Akriti(Ali’s Wife). Raghuvir(Nepali Guard). Virendra(Court Clerk). Banwari Lal Jhol(Chauffeur). Neha Gupta(Tiwari’s Wife). Mukund Bhatt(Clay Helper). Ramesh(Wardboy). Tarachand Chhabra(Guru’s Father). Saqib Pandor(Tall Doctor). Anupama Minz(Khan’s Wife). Tishya Tara(Khan’s daughter). Edith Minz(Khan’s Mother in Law). Adi Vyom(Khan’s Son). Mohit Chauhan(Builder Ali). Mukesh Manas(Goon).Nalneesh. Nalneesh Neel(Goon). Bhagwan Das Patel(Blind Beggar). Vivek Kumar Singh(Amit (as Vivak Kumar Singh)). Kumar Vindra(Killer boy)

Language Hindi.

Producers Gitika Aggarwal. Shahnaab Alam. Martijn de Grunt. Naved Farooqui. Isabelle Huige. Trevor Ingman. Achin Jain. Asif Kapadia. Anurag Kashyap. Guneet Monga. Arun Rangachari. Vivek Rangachari. Meraj Shaikh. Lee Stone.

Production Yaffle Film. Sikhya Entertainmen. Pardesi Film.
